data.title: Research Guides at Musselman Library
data.meta_description: Research Guides: Librarian Resources: Library and Info. Science
data.text:
Choice Reviews

Provides brief reviews of significant current books and electronic resources of interest to those in higher education.

Classification Web

Provides web access to Library of Congress Classification and Library of Congress Subject Headings. 4 users.

EZBorrow

EZBorrow via PALCI is an interlibrary loan service. Use EZBorrow to request items that Musselman Library does not have in its collection.

Library and Information Sciences Abstracts (LISA) This link opens in a new window

Provides abstracts from over 440 periodicals from more than 68 countries and in more than 20 different languages for library professionals. Coverage: 1969-present.

Library, Information Science & Technology Abstracts (LISTA) This link opens in a new window

Provides citations to articles on library and information science from more than 730 journals. Subject coverage includes librarianship, classification, cataloging, information retrieval, information management, and more. Years of coverage: mid-1960â€™s to the present.

RDA Toolkit

The resource description and access toolkit provides a comprehensive set of guidelines and instructions covering all types of content and media. 3 users.

Ulrich's Periodical Directory This link opens in a new window

Content includes detailed information for magazines, journals, newspapers, and other serial publications, 1665 to the present. Provides data points such as ISSN, publisher, language, subject, abstracting & indexing coverage, full-text database coverage, tables of contents, peer review status, and reviews.
